risks.title: SF team bandwidth causing delays
risks.description: SF team busy with other stakeholder tasks may delay completion of NADCAP action plan and SF documentation review, risking readiness for NADCAP Audit and pre-audit planned for 2026-03-26.

risks.title: Documentation hierarchy misunderstanding
risks.description: If we don't fully understand documentation hierarchy, the overarching SF QMS could have inaccuracies, undermining signposting and guidance for unfamiliar users.

risks.title: Surface Finish Table 1 validation delayed
risks.description: Process engineer responsible for validating Surface Finish Table 1 is overloaded and may not complete the review in time.
mitigations: Set firm deadlines and escalate if missed
